title: Video: Lovelace doctors having success with new breast cancer removal tool
text: Lovelace doctors having success with new breast cancer removal tool KOB Albuquerque, NMOct. 09, 2015. 07:28 PM EST Scientists are always trying to figure out new ways to tackle cancer. Doctors at Lovelace Women's... More » Scientists are always trying to figure out new ways to tackle cancer. Doctors at Lovelace Women's Hospital in Albuquerque are using a new tool while removing cancerous tumors. « Less Tags
